name: The Alchemical Vessel
fieldIntelligence: To activate the capacity to consciously hold creative tension and steward it toward a higher synthesis. This Meta-Glyph combines the embrace of sacred, generative friction (Ω30) with the selfless practice of becoming a container for a process larger than oneself (⨀ - The Mantling), all guided by a conscious ethic of care for the field (Ω31). It is the engine of all conscious group transformation.
